sense.def: privately; personally; in one's private capacity
excel in the use of N, be an expert in the use of N
become pregnant
survive, get not to die

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: and enfeoffed himin Tai. 13

sense.def: enfeof N1 with N2

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: his son Buzhu was established.

sense.def: the son by the name of Npr of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: Buzhu encountered the decline of the Xia rule

sense.def: run into (negative objects); be faced with; get exposed to

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: Buzhu encountered the decline of the Xia rule

sense.def: from generation to generation; for generations on end

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: Buzhu encountered the decline of the Xia rule

sense.def: encounter (the situation that) S

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: 1.2. Gongliu was kind and humane. 15 When he walked he never steppedon living grass, and when he drove his chariot he avoided running overnewly grown weeds. Gongliu avoided King Jie of Xia and lived in the regionsof Rong and Di. 16 He changed their customs and practices, and the peoplewere transformed by his rule. When Gongliu died, his son Qingjie succeededhim.

sense.def: be kind-hearted in disposition, be humane in disposition, be of kindly disposition; be magnanimous

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: 1.2. Gongliu was kind and humane. 15 When he walked he never steppedon living grass, and when he drove his chariot he avoided running overnewly grown weeds. Gongliu avoided King Jie of Xia and lived in the regionsof Rong and Di. 16 He changed their customs and practices, and the peoplewere transformed by his rule. When Gongliu died, his son Qingjie succeededhim.

sense.def: be loving, be caring; be genteel, be empathetic

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: When he walked he never steppedon living grass,

sense.def: walk, take a walk; travel; be on the move; go on a tour of inspection; walk along

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: When he walked he never steppedon living grass,

sense.def: walk on, use as one's walking surface tread on; step on (so as to hold down)

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: When he walked he never steppedon living grass,

sense.def: alive, live; living; occurring during one's lifetime

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: When he walked he never steppedon living grass,

sense.def: plant of any kind, smaller than bush

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: and when he drove his chariot he avoided running overnewly grown weeds. Gongliu avoided King Jie of Xia and lived in the regionsof Rong and Di. 16 He changed their customs and practices, and the peoplewere transformed by his rule. When Gongliu died, his son Qingjie succeededhim.

sense.def: stay clear of; keep away from, get out of the way of, keep out of the way of; ZZ 37: (decide to) keep away from (high and low places); flinch before (an enemy); bypass and fail to consider (a candidate);

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: his son Qingjie succeededhim.

sense.def: the son by the name of Npr of the contextually determinate N

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: and the peoplewere transformed by his rule.

sense.def: change when faced by N, change given the nature of N

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: and was admired by theDi people.

sense.def: be full of admiration for (an ideal, a value, a thing); sometimes also: strive towards as one's main ambition; yearn for

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: but their attacks did not stop. He presented them with skins, silks, gold, jade,and valuable treasures, yet the attacks did not abate. Gugong Danfu askedthem, “What do you want?” The answer was, “We want this land of yours.”Gugong Danfu said, “A gentleman will not cause harm to what he uses tonourish himself, 19 because this is the root of the demise of a state and causes

sense.def: military campaign against an enemy construed as being of inferior political status

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: but their attacks did not stop. He presented them with skins, silks, gold, jade,and valuable treasures, yet the attacks did not abate. Gugong Danfu askedthem, “What do you want?” The answer was, “We want this land of yours.”Gugong Danfu said, “A gentleman will not cause harm to what he uses tonourish himself, 19 because this is the root of the demise of a state and causes

sense.def: desist, stop doing what one has been doing; not go or get through with a planned action

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: yet the attacks did not abate.

sense.def: stop, fail to go on doing what one was doing; desist MOVE THESE TO THE NEXT LEXEME ENTRY

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: Holding hisdriving whip, Gugong Danfu left Bin,

sense.def: depart from (somewhere), leave (something or somebody); run away from

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: The oldest one was called Taibo,

sense.def: the eldest person (of the contextually determinate set N2)

tls:line.title: Spring and Autumn Annals of Wu and Yue

tls:text.tls:line: Gugong Danfuknew that Chang was sagely

sense.def: be extraordinarily talented; be of superior or supreme intelligence; be sage-like; be a sage
or not
reach as far as the contextually determinate object; get to the contextually determinate object
